title: Shaheen AI
description: Advanced AI platform for intelligent automation
longDescription: Shaheen AI is a comprehensive artificial intelligence platform designed to streamline business operations through intelligent automation. The platform leverages cutting-edge machine learning algorithms to provide predictive analytics, natural language processing, and automated decision-making capabilities.
challenges: Integrating multiple AI models into a unified platform
Ensuring real-time performance with large datasets
Creating an intuitive user interface for complex AI operations
solutions: Developed a microservices architecture for scalable AI processing
Implemented caching layers and optimized database queries
Created a component-based UI with real-time feedback

title: Docline
description: cross platform mobile application for telehealth services
longDescription: a full-stack telehealth application built with Flutter that enables secure video consultations, real-time messaging, appointment management, and comprehensive medical record keeping. The platform serves three distinct user roles: patients, doctors, and administrators, providing a complete healthcare ecosystem, HIPAA-compliant mobile application that connects healthcare providers with patients. Features include appointment scheduling, telemedicine capabilities, prescription management, medical records access, and secure messaging.

title: «مكتبة السودان الرقمية»
longDescription: A digital library for the Sudan, built this library using React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and PostgreSQL. I also built the backend using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.

title: AI Customer Support Chatbot
longDescription: An advanced AI-powered chatbot system that handles customer inquiries, provides product information, processes orders, and escalates complex issues to human agents. The system uses natural language understanding to provide accurate and contextually relevant responses.

title: Aramco CCC Infrastructure
longDescription: A comprehensive infrastructure setup project for Aramco CCC, involving cloud architecture design, security implementation, database configuration, and deployment pipelines. The system ensures high availability, scalability, and compliance with enterprise security standards.
challenges: Ensuring compliance with strict security requirements
Designing for high availability and disaster recovery
solutions: Implemented comprehensive security policies and monitoring
Designed redundant architecture with automatic failover
Created automated deployment pipelines with rollback capabilities

title: MD Assistant
longDescription: A desktop app and system that utilizes Python's native libraries to merge multiple files into a single document, cross-check it with different .xlsx files and provides a final checked file, enhancing user productivity and document management by saving the Users up to 2 hrs of daily work..
challenges: Integrating multiple AI models into a unified platform
Ensuring real-time performance with large datasets
Creating an intuitive user interface for complex AI operations
solutions: Developed a microservices architecture for scalable AI processing
Implemented caching layers and optimized database queries
Created a component-based UI with real-time feedback

title: SaaS Platform Web Application
description: Full-stack SaaS platform for business management
longDescription: A comprehensive Software-as-a-Service platform that helps businesses manage their operations, from customer relationship management to project tracking and financial reporting. The platform features role-based access control, real-time collaboration, and extensive customization options.

title: Pathfinder
description: Mobile application for tracking your journey
longDescription: A fleet management system that allows organizations to track and manage their fleet of vehicles in real-time, I co-founded this fleet-tracking system startup, we built it using Micro-services architecture, I designed, build and developed the Mobile app and many microservices and their database..

title: HomeStyle
description: Modern UI/UX design for a furniture business mobile application
longDescription: A comprehensive UI/UX design project for a furniture retail mobile application, focusing on creating an intuitive and visually appealing shopping experience. The design includes product browsing, detailed product views, AR room visualization, shopping cart functionality, and seamless checkout flow. The interface emphasizes modern aesthetics with clean layouts, high-quality product imagery, and user-friendly navigation to enhance the furniture shopping experience.
